Name: Jackie O's Rose
Ingredients: 50 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with lime wedge on rim.
Review: In its simplest form, this is a Daiquiri with added triple sec and rose water - or a Margarita with rum. Whatever, it's a good balance of sweet and sour.
History: I don't know the origin of this cocktail, but in March 2021, I revisited the recipe to arrive at the above. Our/the original recipe: 60ml (2oz) Light white rum 15ml (½oz) Triple sec 30ml (1oz) Lime juice 15ml (½oz) Sugar syrup 2.5ml (½ spoon) Rosewater
Nutrition: One serving of Jackie O's Rose contains 191 calories
